Name: Chill Bill
Ingredients: Top up with Thomas Henry Bitter Lemon
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Goblet glass .
Prepare lemon slice wheel for garnish.
POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass.
Review: Bitter lemon balances sweet lychee liqueur in this simple and lightly alcoholic long drink.
Nutrition: One serving of Chill Bill contains 41 calories
